title: SURGE-WSI 6-Layer Architecture
prompt: Create a professional vertical flowchart showing 6 connected layers of a trading system architecture. Each layer is a horizontal bar with distinct color: Layer 1 'Data Pipeline' (blue #3B82F6) with database and filter icons, Layer 2 'Regime + Time' (purple #8B5CF6) with clock and state machine icons, Layer 3 'POI Detection' (green #10B981) with chart pattern icons, Layer 4 'Entry Trigger' (orange #F59E0B) with alert/bell icons, Layer 5 'Risk Management' (red #EF4444) with shield and calculator icons, Layer 6 'Smart Exit' (cyan #06B6D4) with door/exit icons. Layers connected by glowing arrows flowing downward. Dark slate background (#1E293B). Clean modern infographic style with icons inside each layer bar. Labels on each layer clearly visible.
negative_prompt: blurry, 3D perspective, cluttered, overlapping elements, hard to read text, inconsistent colors, cartoonish
